lines.text: What if... the tattoo ink they used was also some sort of feign-death poison?
What, like the kind what makes you stop breathin' for a while?
The kind that stops your circulation and heartbeat, 'til it wears off and you wake up?
Well, are you sure? Magic potions can do a lot.
'Cept we didn't find any used potion bottles or anythin'.
We conducted a pretty thorough search before you got here.
What, without touching anything? How's that ''thorough''?
Well, if you're so sure we missed somethin', go ahead and look for it.
Because you've decided to use a w-wild accusation as a pretext to- to violate protocol.
